mapper.insert: insert into userdata(name, password, phone_no, email, license_no, activate_key, session_key, status, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{phoneNo}, #{email}, #{licenseNo}, #{activateKey}, #{sessionKey}, #{status}, #{createdOn}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedOn}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select: select id, name, phone_no as phoneNo, email, license_no as licenseNo from userdata where email = #{email} and phone_no = #{phoneNo}
